mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pw, nick, email) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nick}, #{email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
select count(*) from member where nick=#{nick}
select count(*) from member where email=#{email}
select mId, pw from member where id=#{id}
select id, nick, email from member where mId=#{mId}
mapper.update: update member set id=#{id}, pw=#{pw}, nick=#{nick}, email=#{email} where mId=#{mId}
